frontmatter.title: Layout
frontmatter.description: Instructions for using Innovaccer Design System layout. We use 8px as the base unit for our spacial system.

internal.content:
--- title: Layout description: Instructions for using Innovaccer Design System layout. We use 8px as the base unit for our spacial system. date: 15 June 2021 showMobile: true --- #### Spacing We use 8px as the base unit for our spacial system. The spacing system has been roughly generated by multiplying eight with even numbers.
![](./images/spacing.png)


#### Grid Using a baseline grid creates a consistent rhythm between the components and typography. We use a 12-columns grid.
##### Types ###### Regular Grid
![](./images/grid-layout.jpeg)
###### Grid with margin For the outermost grid, this component is used. This can also be nested subsequently if a 16px padding is required on both sides.

![](./images/grid-margin.jpeg)

##### Columns The column includes the padding at the inside, 8 px each side. This way the gutter becomes 16px for adjacent columns. ![](./images/grid-column.jpeg)

##### Components We use a 8px baseline grid. All UI components including paddings and margins are created in multiples of eight so that everything aligns to the pixel grid. When text is used within a UI element, set the line-height to be consistent with the baseline grid. ![](./images/baseline-grid.png)

##### Typography All typography aligns to a 4px baseline grid. This allows for readable line heights at all sizes. ![](./images/typography.png)
